subdisciplines.name: Critical race theory
subdisciplines.description: The examination of race and racism within media, particularly how it perpetuates social inequality.

subdisciplines.name: Feminist media criticism
subdisciplines.description: The exploration of the representation of gender in media, and how it affects gender inequality.

subdisciplines.name: Political economy of media
subdisciplines.description: The analysis of how media ownership, regulation, and political influences shape media content.
